DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of multiple doses of pregabalin in pediatric patients with partial onset seizures that are incompletely controlled on their current medications.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetic Study of Pregabalin in Pediatric Patients With Partial Onset Seizures
DOC.criteria: Partial onset seizures, incompletely controlled on 13 medications At least 1 seizure per 28 days, on average Primary generalized seizures Progressive CNS pathology
DOC.keyword: Partial-onset seizures; epilepsy; pediatric; pregabalin; safety; tolerability; pharmacokinetics
